alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:36PM EDT until July 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CHESHIRE COUNTY... At 536 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Antrim to Dublin to near Winchester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Swanzey, Peterborough, Winchester, Antrim, Dublin, Richmond, Harrisville, Nelson, Marlborough, Rindge, Hinsdale, Roxbury, Fitzwilliam, Troy, Sullivan, Chesterfield, Gilsum and Windsor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
